text: Wolfgang Böhmer (born 27 January 1936) is a German politician (CDU). He was the 5th Minister-President of Saxony-Anhalt from 16 May 2002 to 19 April 2011. He was President of the Bundesrat in 2002/03. He has been a critic of Angela Merkel.Helmut Breuer and Ansgar Graw (January 10, 2002), Rüttgers: NRW-CDU für Kandidatur Merkels Die Welt.Desmond Butler (April 22, 2002), Conservatives Surge in German State Elections New York Times. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Saxony-Anhalt
title: Wolfgang Böhmer
